H3.text: what rainforest is in south america. Amazon Basin

A4.text: Most of the basin is covered by the Amazon rainforest, also known as Amazonia.

A5.text: With a 6 million km2 (2.3 million mi2) area of dense tropical forest, it is the largest rainforest in the world.
